Twopoint correlations¶

A PipelineStage implements a single calculation step within a wider pipeline.

Each different type of analysis stge is represented by a subclass of this base class. The base class handles the connection between different pipeline stages, and the execution of the stages within a workflow system (parsl), potentially in parallel (MPI).

An instance of one of these classes represents an actual run of the stage, with the required inputs, outputs, and configuration specified.

See documentation pages for more details.

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__delattr__()¶

Implement delattr(self, name).

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__dir__()¶

Default dir() implementation.

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__eq__()¶

Return self==value.

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__format__()¶

Default object formatter.

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__ge__()¶

Return self>=value.

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__getattribute__()¶

Return getattr(self, name).

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__gt__()¶

Return self>value.

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__hash__()¶

Return hash(self).

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__le__()¶

Return self<=value.

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__lt__()¶

Return self<value.

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__ne__()¶

Return self!=value.

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__new__()¶

Create and return a new object. See help(type) for accurate signature.

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__reduce__()¶

Helper for pickle.

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__reduce_ex__()¶

Helper for pickle.

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__repr__()¶

Return repr(self).

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__setattr__()¶

Implement setattr(self, name, value).

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__sizeof__()¶

Size of object in memory, in bytes.

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__str__()¶

Return str(self).

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__subclasshook__()¶

Abstract classes can override this to customize issubclass().

This is invoked early on by abc.ABCMeta.__subclasscheck__(). It should return True, False or NotImplemented. If it returns NotImplemented, the normal algorithm is used. Otherwise, it overrides the normal algorithm (and the outcome is cached).

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.comm¶

The MPI communicator object (None if not running under MPI)

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.config¶

Returns the configuration dictionary for this stage, aggregating command line options and optional configuration file.

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.rank¶

The rank of this process under MPI (0 if not running under MPI)

txpipe.TXTwoPoint.size¶

The number or processes under MPI (1 if not running under MPI)
